name: A Simple Cube the Story Begins
name_original: A Simple Cube the Story Begins
description: It is a short game with weird movement and is about the cube that is in the floor is lava game. you play until near the end it gets weird. to finish a level go to the square. and there is challenges also like getting all 3 coins and good to speed run. put on full screen if you want all the UI buttons to be seen on some levels. Use arrow keys or WASD to move w and s are up and force down. same but with arrow keys also.
